sent.orig: III Bill sum: 10 million USD each time, top sum is 500 billion USD.
sent.trans: 三。开票金额：一次为1000万美元，总金额最高可到5000亿美金。

sent.orig: The Tender Sum shall be fixed lump sum.
sent.trans: 总数将是固定的总计金额的投标。

sent.orig: If small sum does not go out, large sum will not come in.
Do you have your résumé?Yes,I can send you a copy of my résumé if you like.
The two optimal rules is minimum sum of error square and minimum sum of error value.
sent.trans: 这两种最优准则是误差平方和最小和误差绝对值和最小。
